channel.title: Auto Clicker Help
channel.description:
I was looking for auto clicker that would click on specific colours that i have picked to click on.. i remember using this kind of thing back when i was playing Rs2 but i cant find it on good or anywhere.. ive only found auto clickers that would click only where the mouses current position. or you have to pay for it.
i was thinkin of trying the auto clicker for FarmVille an application on facebook. for people who know about the game you should have noticed its a pain in the asss to keep clicking on the land to do everything one by one. not sure if it would work but might as well try it out..
so all i need is a auto clicker that would click on colours that i have picked on the screen n click on it multiple times.
thanks in advance

item.title: Auto Clicker Help
item.dc:creator: @darkilla darkilla
item.description:
@darkilla wrote:

haha yess yess thats the main problem lol… i juss got plants everywhere haha didnt bother with the animal n barn stuff…

Read full topic

item.title: Auto Clicker Help
item.dc:creator: @SomethingToHide STH
item.description:
@SomethingToHide wrote:

I actually just wrote a SCAR script two days ago for this.

Only because I have the largest size plot of land 95% covered in plants and I don’t have enough time anymore to click each square 3 times.

It’s cool. All I have to do whenever I plant a new crop is pick a good color for the crop and add that to my options.

Read full topic

ohh wow…
u are GODD lol thankss broo
